user_request: install app "Lyft - Rideshare, Bikes, Scooters & Transit"
screen_desc: The screenshot displays the home screen of an Android smartphone. It includes various app icons such as Google apps (Photos, Maps, Play Store), productivity tools (Adobe Acrobat, Calendar, Chrome), and utility apps (Drive, Camera, Clock). There is also a row of apps like eBay, Expedia, and DuckDuckGo. The search bar at the top and the app launcher bar at the bottom are visible, providing easy access to apps and Google services.
action_plan: Tap on the Play Store icon on the home screen to open the Google Play Store.

action_with_memory.Next Single Step Action: Tap on the Play Store icon on the home screen to open the Google Play Store.
